text.div:
COVID19 RxNorm Value Set for Lopinavir/Ritonavir

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    Code Display
    1163857 lopinavir / ritonavir Oral Liquid Product
    1163858 lopinavir / ritonavir Oral Product
    1163859 lopinavir / ritonavir Pill
    1168546 Kaletra Oral Product
    1168549 Kaletra Pill
    1168552 Kaletra Oral Liquid Product
    284640 lopinavir / ritonavir
    284756 Kaletra
    311368 lopinavir 133 MG / ritonavir 33.3 MG Oral Capsule
    311369 lopinavir 80 MG/ML / ritonavir 20 MG/ML Oral Solution
    374642 lopinavir / ritonavir Oral Capsule
    374643 lopinavir / ritonavir Oral Solution
    597729 lopinavir / ritonavir Oral Tablet
    597730 lopinavir 200 MG / ritonavir 50 MG Oral Tablet
    670079 lopinavir 200 MG / ritonavir 50 MG Oral Capsule
    746645 lopinavir 100 MG / ritonavir 25 MG Oral Tablet
    847739 lopinavir 200 MG / ritonavir 50 MG [Kaletra]
    847740 lopinavir / ritonavir Oral Tablet [Kaletra]
    847741 lopinavir 200 MG / ritonavir 50 MG Oral Tablet [Kaletra]
    847743 lopinavir 100 MG / ritonavir 25 MG [Kaletra]
    847745 lopinavir 100 MG / ritonavir 25 MG Oral Tablet [Kaletra]
    847747 lopinavir 80 MG/ML / ritonavir 20 MG/ML [Kaletra]
    847748 lopinavir / ritonavir Oral Solution [Kaletra]
    847749 lopinavir 80 MG/ML / ritonavir 20 MG/ML Oral Solution [Kaletra]
